message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll be interested in. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thank you for offering the product. I appreciate your generosity. I am willing to pay $95 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking more along the lines of $110.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to continue our discussion. I am willing to pay $105 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to consider your offer, but I need to think about the value of the product. I'm thinking of a price of $115.
I understand your perspective, Alice. I am still interested in purchasing this product. I am willing to pay $110 for it.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I can do $112.50.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am willing to pay $110 for the product.
I'm not budging much more, Bob. I can see you're serious about the product, so I'll meet you at $112. But that's as low as I can go.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $108 for the product.
